main.name: Ariel Leon Flores
main.bio: I'm Ariel ,a newly minted Full-Stack Developper! I have extensive experience in hospitality, sales and customer service and I am fluent in English, French and Spanish. I have always had an interest in Web Developement and in 2020 I decided to see where my interest would take me. After a 4 months Web-Developement bootcamp at Lighthouse Labs, I have decided to jump fully into Web-developement and I'm excited to see where this new journey will take me!
